data.event: A post office was established in 1883.

event.title: now a museum, and is listed

data.event: The railroad depot is now a museum, and is listed on the National Register of Historic Places.

event.title: 1941, the Mississippi Ordnance Plant was constructed

data.event: In 1941, the Mississippi Ordnance Plant was constructed north of Flora to produce propellant and igniter charges for large-caliber guns.

event.title: 1942, a local group of African-American citizens met

data.event: In 1942, a local group of African-American citizens met to protest the company's policy.
